mmmmmmmmmmmmm     Mariko Izumi!!!!  If I ever met her, I would be on her like a bass on a junebug!!!  Wow she's hot!!

I heard about 5 months ago that the CTC stores would be offering EVERYTHING just like a Walmant.  I have noticed that the Whitby North store has gotten better with the fishing items they sell yet they do not have stock when the flyer comes out (just like every other store)...  I know from talking to 2 owners that the fishing department stock/selection is decided on by the owner and managers and how close they are to a "hot zone" for fishing.  Look at the one in North Barrie, way more items then the one in Markham but that is all in relation to areas to fish and the amount of anglers in the door.  CTC is going through a big change and it will get better (I hope) to lower the cost for the "good stuff" for use poor folk. For those that do not know, I do not work for CTC in any way (but looking for a job!)

Hey, Isn't this a Mariko Izumi thread.  Stop trying to hyjack it. lol.  Just kidding. Here is what I think.  CTC in Barrie has always been quite good.  I used to work exclusively in the fishing dept when it was in the old location in Bayfield mall.  We always stocked good stuff.  I have been to some Canadian tires in other cities and they had barely any fishing supplies.  I was surprised as I assumed all the stores would be the same. Now here is what I have noticed recently.  The price of their lures and equipment has gone up consideralbly this year.  You can't seem to buy a rapala for under a $10.  Wal-mart prices have gone up as well.  Big O in walmart and CTC is $8.  Still $4.99 at BPS.  Claking rap at CTC and Walmart is almost $11.  wow! $11 for a lipless crank.  I bought one on sale for $7 but even that is too much.  i have a few sebile lipless cranks that cost me $10 each (an haven't caught me anything yet). Seems like every lure at CTC has gone up by at least $1 this year.  not cool.

Yea Anyways Mariko i think is the same age as me .  LOL  Yea It's funny though if i ever need something in an emergency or if my car breaks down on a Sat,Sunday or after shop hours CT has always been there.  Any  other day it be my local parts supplier that i have an account with .  Yes i know i use and abuse Canadian Tire like a Prostitute

The Lindsay store is awesome......for a CT.  They even have a musky section  I go to that one anytime I need something from CT. I have 2 that are half the distance away, but they never have what I need.......fishing related or not.  The Bowmanville store is useless........don't even go there if you have to!!!  Sinker
